welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Haslett, where small town charm meets big city excitement! Known for our beautiful parks and friendly community, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Capital City Airport, featuring a variety of shops, restaurants, and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B is primarily used for domestic flights and offers a range of services for passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Terminal C is used for international flights and features duty-free shopping and dining options.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport with no time limit.
